title: E74 A Polite Shadowman and a Phony Film School
description: #FORSHERMAN. I won't accept anything less. Em is at Linda's wedding all week, so we're presenting one of our favorite live recordings ever, coming straight from the Hollywood Improv. Em covers the Pantages Theater, and Christine covers Clara Phillips - AKA the Tiger Woman - purrrrrrr?
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
